question_string: I __________ working all afternoon and have just finished the assignment.
Rohan __________ the movie before he read the review.
He __________ in the States but he still does not have a command over the English language.
By the next month, we shall __________ the project.
Every boy and girl  __________ in the class today.
He __________ daily for a year now.
Which tense is used to express general truths and facts?
Back in my native place, I __________ a smartphone.

choices.correct: When I woke up, he had already eaten breakfast.
wrong: When I woke up, he has already eaten breakfast.
When I had woken up, he had already ate breakfast.
When I had woken up, he has already ate breakfast.
